introParagraphs: I'm a Cloud DevOps Engineer passionate about automation, orchestration, and continuous integration. I specialize in building resilient infrastructure and streamlining deployment pipelines across cloud environments.

My journey started with a background in Mathematics & Statistics, then evolved into Big Data & Cloud Computing. Today I work with Infrastructure as Code, GitOps workflows, and LLMOps to build and operate production-grade platforms.

whatIDo.text: Deploy & manage Kubernetes clusters on Azure and AWS — from self-managed to AKS/EKS
Build CI/CD pipelines with GitLab CI/CD, GitHub Actions, and Jenkins
Implement Infrastructure as Code with Terraform, Ansible, and Vagrant
Set up observability stacks — monitoring, logging, alerting, tracing
Explore LLMOps & AI infrastructure — deploying LLMs with Ollama, LangChain, and RAG pipelines

footnote: When I'm not deploying to prod, you'll find me experimenting with AI/LLM infrastructure, automating everything in sight, or sharing what I learn at
